select *,t.dtime time from ( select s.id pointId, s.point, s.project_code, s.card_no, s.gateway_serial, c.company_name, AVG(d.p26) battery, AVG(d.p27) network, AVG(b.full_battery) fullBattery, d.mcu, AVG(d.p1) p1, AVG(d.p2) p2, AVG(d.p3) p3, AVG(d.p4) p4, AVG(d.p5) p5, AVG(d.p6) p6, AVG(d.p7) p7, AVG(d.p8) p8, AVG(d.p9) p9, AVG(d.p10) p10, AVG(d.p11) p11, AVG(d.p12) p12, AVG(d.p13) p13, AVG(d.p14) p14, AVG(d.p15) p15, AVG(d.p16) p16, AVG(d.p17) p17, AVG(d.p18) p18, AVG(d.p19) p19, AVG(d.p20) p20, AVG(d.p21) p21, AVG(d.p22) p22, AVG(d.p23) p23, AVG(d.p24) p24, AVG(d.p25) p25, AVG(d.p26) p26, AVG(d.p27) p27, AVG(d.p28) p28, AVG(d.p29) p29, AVG(d.p30) p30, AVG(d.p31) p31, AVG(d.p32) p32,
DATE_FORMAT(d.time,'%Y-%m-%d') dtime
DATE_FORMAT(d.time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00') dtime
DATE_FORMAT(d.time,'%Y-%m-01') dtime
DATE_FORMAT(d.time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') dtime
from wt_data_raw d left join wt_station s on s.gateway_serial = d.mcu left join wt_company c on s.company_id = c.id left join wt_station_base b on s.id = b.station_id
s.point is not null
and d.time >= #{startTime}
and d.time <= #{endTime}
and s.id = ${pointId}
GROUP BY dtime order by d.time desc ) t

select s.id pointId, s.point, s.project_code, s.card_no, s.gateway_serial, c.company_name, d.p26 battery, d.p27 network, b.full_battery fullBattery, d.* from wt_station s left join ( select dr.* from wt_data_raw dr inner join ( select mcu , max(time) time from wt_data_raw group by mcu) drr on dr.mcu = drr.mcu and dr.time = drr.time ) d on s.gateway_serial = d.mcu left join wt_company c on s.company_id = c.id left join wt_station_base b on s.id = b.station_id where s.id = #{stationId} limit 1
select * from wt_data_raw where mcu = ( select gateway_serial from wt_station where id = #{stationId} ) and time > adddate(now(),interval -1 month) order by time desc

select id, mcu, sn, time, p1, p2, p3, p4, p5, p6, p7, p8, p9, p10, p11, p12, p13, p14, p15, p16, p17, p18, p19, p20, p21, p22, p23, p24, p25, p26, p27, p28, p29, p30, p31, p32 from wt_data_raw
AND id=#{id}
select * from wt_data_raw where time> DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - 1 day) and mcu=#{mcu}

select ${param}, time from wt_data_raw where mcu=#{mcuId}
and 1 = 2
and time >= date_format(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00') and time < date_format(date_add(#{startTime},interval 1 hour), '%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00')
and time >= date(#{startTime}) and time < date(date_add(#{startTime},interval 1 day))
order by time
